title: shrI mahA
sahitya:
shrI mahA dEva nAma bhajanamE cittattai shuddham sheyyum marundu


anupallavi

  kAma mudhl aru paghaiyara vENDin kAmanai venra kapAliyin pAvana


caraNam    karpakattai aDuttAl karudum varam kanindu tara varuvAL
veparaiyan magaL oru bhAgan viDaivAhan vEda gItan padamalar paNindu nidam
